code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import futbolcuService from'../services/futbolcuService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FutbolcuListesi(){const[futbolcular,setFutbolcular]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{getFutbolcular();},[]);const getFutbolcular=async()=>{try{const data=await futbolcuService.getFutbolcular();setFutbolcular(data);setLoading(false);}catch(err){setError('Futbolcular yüklenirken bir hata oluştu');setLoading(false);}};if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Y\xFCkleniyor..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Futbolcu Listesi"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"futbolcu-list",children:futbolcular.map(futbolcu=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"futbolcu-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[futbolcu.ad," ",futbolcu.soyad]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Tak\u0131m: ",futbolcu.takim]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Mevki: ",futbolcu.mevki]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Ya\u015F: ",futbolcu.yas]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Gol: ",futbolcu.golSayisi]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Asist: ",futbolcu.asistSayisi]})]},futbolcu._id))})]});}export default FutbolcuListesi;
